alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 13 at 2:31PM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts over 60 mph on the plains. * WHERE...Central and South Weld County County. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust will reduce visibility to less than a quarter mile in places. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
